location details.future_workplace_detail: The main workplace is the office in Shibuya-ku, Tokyo, but office work is basically required on days other than Wednesday.
location details.transfer_detail: There is a possibility of changing the place of work to a place designated by the company.

remote work details.remote_detail: Every Wednesday, employees can choose between office work or remote work. There's a flexible working system called 'Timely Shift' that allows adjusting work hours by up to 1 hour before or after the standard 9:00-18:00 schedule, in 30-minute increments. Additionally, there's a 'Monthly Shift' system for more flexible work arrangements. The 'Rakusmile' system allows employees to choose suitable working hours and evaluation styles during child-rearing periods, available after one year of employment.

smoking prevention details.smoking_prevention_detail: Indoor smoking ban policy has been adopted. It is presumed that there are no smoking areas within the office due to the indoor smoking ban policy.

age and gender.age_genders: No specific age or gender restrictions mentioned. The position appears to be open to all working-age adults regardless of gender.

employment type period.employment_type_remarks: Full-time employee with no fixed term of employment.
employment type period.employment_period_detail: No fixed term of employment as a full-time employee.

trial period.trial_period_working_conditions: No changes in conditions during the trial period

contract renewal.contract_renewal_detail: As it is a permanent employment contract, there are no specific renewal conditions.

job posting.job_description: This is a full-time position in Shibuya, Tokyo. Experience in database design, implementation, and data manipulation using SQL is required. The role involves data quality checks, establishing operational rules for quality maintenance using tools like Great Expectations, supporting data visualization using BI tools like Looker and Tableau, proposing efficiency improvements for data input processes, and supporting business improvements using data. The team manages a wide range of internal data, providing it in an easily accessible format for various departments. The job also involves data collection and processing using cloud technologies like BigQuery and APIs of various SaaS products.
job posting.job_charm_details1: Opportunity to work with the latest data analysis technologies including ETL and BI tools
job posting.job_charm_details2: Chance to collaborate closely with various departments and propose data utilization improvements
job posting.job_charm_details3: Exposure to a wide range of data and the opportunity to perform analyses from various perspectives
job posting.future_job_description_detail: After joining, you may be involved in tasks such as understanding the company's data management system, data preprocessing, and designing and implementing data models.

salary_fixed_allowances_attributes.fixed_allowance_memo: Monthly overtime allowance equivalent to 20 hours regardless of actual overtime worked

salary_variable_allowances_attributes.variable_allowance_memo: Family allowance based on number of children
salary_variable_allowances_attributes.variable_allowance_content: 1 child: 30,000 yen/month, 2 children: 50,000 yen/month, 3 or more children: 60,000 yen/month until age 18. Not applicable for Assistant Managers and above.

salary information.allowance_detail: Family allowance, overtime allowance, night shift allowance, holiday work allowance, commuting allowance, relocation allowance, business trip allowance
salary information.salary_detail: Annual income range from 5,493,636 yen to 7,687,392 yen. Includes basic salary, overtime allowance, and other allowances.
salary information.allowance_commute_detail: Commuting allowance provided up to 100,000 yen per month
salary information.salary_railse_memo: Annual salary increase implemented in May

job working hour.working_hours_detail: Working hours are from 9:00 to 18:00. The Timely Shift system allows changes up to 1 hour before or after in 30-minute increments.
job working hour.working_hours_condition: Timely Shift system allows changing work hours up to 1 hour before or after in 30-minute increments daily or monthly. Examples: 8:00-17:00, 8:30-17:30, 9:30-18:30, 10:00-19:00. Every Wednesday, employees can choose between office work or remote work. The Rakusmile system allows employees to choose suitable working hours and evaluation styles during child-rearing periods, available after one year of employment.

recruiment and hiring.prerequisite: Experience in database design and implementation, and experience in data extraction and manipulation using SQL are required. Experience in big data or data analysis infrastructure construction, and experience in business improvement using IT are welcome.
recruiment and hiring.selection_process: The selection process consists of document screening, first interview (with field staff and HR personnel), aptitude test, and final interview (with executives), in that order.

holidays and leaves.holidays: Complete two-day weekend system (Saturday and Sunday), public holidays, New Year's holidays, summer holidays, paid leave (consumption rate over 93%), maternity leave, special leave (e.g. 7 days for marriage)
holidays and leaves.holidays_remarks: Annual paid leave is granted with a consumption rate of over 93% (as of March 2023). Maternity leave is provided with a 100% return rate after taking it. Special leave is granted, for example, 7 days of leave for marriage. Every Wednesday, employees can choose between office work or working from home. There's a Timely Shift system allowing changes to working hours up to 1 hour before or after in 30-minute units daily/monthly. A Monthly Shift system allows changing working hours on a monthly basis. Child nursing leave is available, with 5 days per child, separate from regular paid leave. Backup leave is an additional leave system for emergencies or special circumstances.

welfare insurance.welfare: Casual dress code for commuting, family allowance, work-from-home days, timely shift system, qualification acquisition support, child care leave, babysitter subsidy system, backup leave, in-house clubs, in-house social events, transportation allowance up to 100,000 yen per month, family allowance (30,000 yen/month for 1 child, 50,000 yen/month for 2 children, 60,000 yen/month for 3 or more children until age 18, excluding assistant managers and managers), qualification acquisition support system, babysitter subsidy system, in-house clubs (baseball, futsal, light music, Gunpla, etc.), in-house social events, and indoor smoking ban measures are provided.
